mapper.select: SELECT t.`T_USER_NUM` FROM `jdbc`.`T_USER` t WHERE t.`T_USER_NUM` = #{userNum}

SELECT T1.`T_ID` AS id, T1.`T_NAME` AS name, T1.`T_URL` AS url, T1.`T_FIRST_JB` AS firstJB, T1.`T_TWO_JB` AS twoJB, T1.`T_TREE_JD` AS treeJB, T1.`T_START` AS start, T1.`T_SORT` AS sort, T1.`T_DESC` AS menuDesc, T1.`T_TIME` AS menuTime FROM `jdbc`.`T_MENU` T1 WHERE T1.`T_START`='1' AND T1.`T_FIRST_JB` < 100 AND T1.`T_TWO_JB` = '00' AND T1.`T_TREE_JD` = '00' ORDER BY T1.`T_FIRST_JB` ASC
